trigger_prototype.name: Incoming dropped packets was detected on {#NICNAME}
Outgoing dropped packets was detected on {#NICNAME}
Quota "{#QUPATH}" has only {ITEM.LASTVALUE} free space left

dependency.name: Quota "{#QUPATH}" has only {ITEM.LASTVALUE} free space left

trigger_prototype.name: Quota "{#QUPATH}" has only {ITEM.LASTVALUE} free space left
Quota "{#QUPATH}" has only {ITEM.LASTVALUE} free space left

dependency.name: Quota "{#QUPATH}" has only {ITEM.LASTVALUE} free space left

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Application audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Application error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Application,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Application warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:perf_counter["\1848(_Total)\1850"].avg(600)}>{$CPU_THRESHOLD_HIGH}
trigger.name: CPU usage exceeded {$CPU_THRESHOLD_HIGH}% on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:perf_counter["\1848(_Total)\1850"].avg(600)}>{$CPU_THRESHOLD_WARN} and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:perf_counter["\1848(_Total)\1850"].avg(600)}<{$CPU_THRESHOLD_HIGH}
trigger.name: CPU usage exceeded {$CPU_THRESHOLD_WARN}% on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:wu.crit.last(0)}>0
trigger.name: Critical Windows updates available on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Directory service audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Directory service error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Directory Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Directory service warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:net.dns[,www.google.com,A].last(3)}<1
trigger.name: DNS resolution failed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: DNS Server audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: DNS Server error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[DNS Server,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: DNS Server warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: File Replication Service audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: File Replication Service error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[File Replication Service,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: File Replication Service warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Security audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Security error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[Security,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: Security warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=7 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: System audit failure message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=4 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logeventid(3)}=0 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: System error message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Excludes the following event IDs: - 3: KDC_ERR_PREAUTH_REQUIRED

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].logseverity(0)}=2 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:eventlog[System,,"Warning|Error|Failure",,,,skip].nodata(10m)}=0
trigger.name: System warning message(s) logged in eventlog on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:wu.all.last(0)}>0 and {Template OS Windows - Jim Cronqvist:wu.crit.last(0)}<1
trigger.name: Windows updates available on {HOST.NAME}
